de.tudresden.inf.rn.mobilis.sea.pubsub.model.tree.leaves.interfaces

Interface ICurrentPlayerData

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StatisticsFacade

    public interface ICurrentPlayerData
    This is an auxiliary interface to declare some methods which may be done on a CurrentPlayerData Node

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Set the number of ball contacts of this player.

      Set the statistic values of a player.

      Set the total amount of time on which this player had possession of the ball.

    • Method Detail

      • setPlayerStatistic

        void setPlayerStatistic(int id,
                      int passesMade,
                      int passesReceived,
                      int tacklings,
                      int tacklesWon,
                      int goalsScored,
                      int ballContacts,
                      long possessionTime,
                      float totalDistance)
        Set the statistic values of a player. The player must be registered first (StatisticsFacade.registerPlayer(id)). Otherwise nothing will be published
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the player
        passesMade - the number of passes made by this player
        passesReceived - the number of passes received by this player
        tacklings - the number of tacklings of this player
        tacklesWon - the number of successful tacklings of this player
        goalsScored - the number of goals scored by this player
        ballContacts - the number of ball contacts of this player
        totalDistance - the total distance this player has covered

      • setPassesMade

        void setPassesMade(int id,
                 int passesMade)
        Set the number of passes made by this player. The player must be registered first (StatisticsFacade.registerPlayer(id)). Otherwise nothing will be published
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the player
        passesMade - the number of passes made by this player
